PySumpas: Secure Passwords through Hashes and Ciphers

PySumpas is a password generator in Python/Tkinter. It takes user input and creates an MD5sum, SHA256sum, or Blowfish cipher. Random password generation is also supported.

== Features ==

* MD5 hashing
* SHA256 hashing
* Blowfish cipher
* Random password generation

== TODO ==

* Support for MD5 and SHA256 generation from random input
* Code cleanup

== Use ==

PySumpas is not part of the Ubuntu or Debian repositories. See <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1009447|HowTo: Create a Secure Password]]</nowiki> for details on obtaining and using PySumpas.
